title: Resilient IBM i workloads using PowerHA and Global Replication Services on PowerVS
introduction: This pattern describes how IBM i 7.5 and PowerHA SystemMirror for i combined with IBM Cloud Power Virtual Server Global Replication Services (GRS) enables high availability (HA) and disaster recovery (DR) for mission-critical workloads. The intent is to provide a reusable reference architecture, implementation sequencing, operational model, and validation approach that customers can apply to build resilient IBM i services in the cloud.
